properties.name: facebook
properties.description: The Facebook URL for the company

properties.name: linkedin
properties.description: The LinkedIn URL for the company

properties.name: twitter
properties.description: The Twitter handle for the company

properties.name: name
properties.description: Name is the partial name of the company

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Auto-complete company names and retrieve logo and domain

properties.name: Enrich
properties.description: Look up person and company data based on an email or domain

properties.name: email
properties.description: The email address to look up

properties.name: companyDomain
properties.description: The domain for the person’s employer

properties.name: familyName
properties.description: Last name of person. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.

properties.name: ipAddress
properties.description: IP address of the person. If you have this, passing this is strongly recommended to improve match rates.

properties.name: location
properties.description: The city or country where the person resides

properties.name: linkedIn
properties.description: The LinkedIn URL for the person

properties.name: resource
properties.description: The Company API allows you to look up a company by their domain

properties.name: Person
properties.description: The Person API lets you retrieve social information associated with an email address, such as a person’s name, location and Twitter handle
